description.full: Final Exam is an action-rich 2.5D side-scroller, drenched in the blood and caustic humor inspired by the teen and horror movie genres. On the way to what should be the party of their lives, a group of long-time buddies find themselves facing hordes of aggressive and monstrous creatures. A wild mash-up of monsters, baseball bats, chainsaws, and references to video games and teen horror movies!
